name: Zombo
description:
You are Enro Uerthe. You were sent to a zombie infested town to kill the man who did a zombie virus to infect people. No one knows why he did it, but he will have to pay for it. 

It's very known, that he is hiding in a base to protect himself. He will probably have many soldiers or robots protecting him, so it will be a hard mission. You can never know what you can expect there, so you must be careful. 

By the way, you have only pistol with you at start, sooo... Good Luck! You will need it.

  

Features: Retro styled game with retro graphics and retro gameplay. Easy in beginning, but hard in ending. Four acts, each with five parts and each part with fifteen levels plus final showdown. Ten types of enemies, six melee and four shooting. Four weapons you can use. Hard bossfight, but not impossible. Various kind of areas: town, grassy area, snowy area, old town, city, ruins, bases, dungeons etc.

 

If you encounter any bugs, please write it to comments section.

 

If you are using Windows 10 then you need to update it and set compatility mode to Windows 7 on Zombo shortcut or .exe.
